response.overview: Seventy years old Kim Young Gu lives in Yangsan, Gyeong Nam. He is an ordinary farmer, but he has a camera and he films his daily lives. An independent filmmaker DK Kim Tae Kyun lives in Busan. He thinks that cinema is completed when anyone can make a film. He happens to watch , Kim Young Gu’s silver award winning film of 2001 Busan film festival, and decides to meet with him as he feels that senior Kim Young Gu and his work represent ideal filmmaking. In the film, Independent filmmaker DK Kim Tae Kyun recreates the making of with Mr. Kim.
response.title: Film Makers
